tool_description: Determines the applicable tax jurisdictions and codes for a given location, handling complex multi-level tax authorities.

city.description: City name for local tax jurisdiction resolution

postal_code.description: Postal code for precise jurisdiction mapping

error_messages: Unsupported country: Tax jurisdiction data is not available for the specified country.
Invalid state/province: The state or province is not recognized for the given country.
Jurisdiction lookup failed: Unable to determine tax jurisdiction for the provided location data.
usage: Provide country_code and state_province as minimum requirements. Include city and postal_code for more precise jurisdiction resolution. Returns applicable tax authority codes and hierarchy.

federal_jurisdiction.description: Federal or national tax authority code

state_jurisdiction.description: State or provincial tax authority code

local_jurisdiction.description: Local or municipal tax authority code

jurisdiction_hierarchy.description: Ordered list of all applicable tax jurisdictions
